thread.title: Asia stocks pummeled by fresh Wall Street sell-off

title: Asia stocks pummeled by fresh Wall Street sell-off
text:
Asia stocks pummeled by fresh Wall Street sell-off 10:07am GMT - 00:43 
Asian stocks tumbled to two-month lows on Friday after Wall Street shares suffered yet another big slide in the face of rapidly-rising bond yields. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Asian stocks tumbled to two-month lows on Friday after Wall Street shares suffered yet another big slide in the face of rapidly-rising bond yields. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sfGE1c
